docs.title: Stringborn Universe - Documentation Index
docs.description: Welcome to the Stringborn Universe documentation! This directory contains comprehensive guides for all major systems in the project.

docs.title: Stringborn Universe (PS) - Project Overview
docs.description: A **community-driven sci-fi universe platform** featuring character progression, asset creation, galactic exploration, and real-time multiplayer interaction.

docs.title: Admin/Debug Status Bar
docs.description: A thin, unobtrusive status bar at the bottom of the page for admins to monitor system health and enable debugging features.

docs.title: Main Menu System
docs.description: A beautiful, organized main menu page that provides easy access to all features of the Stringborn Universe, including the new Asset Builder system.

docs.title: Tester Quick Reference Card
docs.description: **URL Format:**

docs.title: User & Character Reference Guide
docs.description: To see your character's location on the map, you need to navigate to:

docs.title: Analytics & Achievement System
docs.description: A comprehensive user behavior tracking and achievement system for the Stringborn Universe platform.

docs.title: Asset Builder System - Complete Guide
docs.description: A comprehensive community-driven asset creation, approval, and voting system for the Stringborn Universe. This system empowers the community to build rich, stat-based game assets with lore, collaboration features, and democratic voting.

docs.title: Documentation System Implementation
docs.description: A comprehensive documentation browsing system with automatic tree generation and scheduled updates via cron jobs.

docs.title: Galactic Map & Universe System - Complete Guide
docs.description: The Stringborn Universe features a 5000x5000 galactic space with real-time 2D physics simulation, multiplayer interaction, navigation system, and four domain-based starting hubs.

docs.title: Location-Based Character System - Implementation Summary
docs.description: We've implemented a comprehensive location-based system where characters are attached to specific assets (space hubs, planets, stations) rather than just floating coordinates. Characters now dock at locations, and their positions are derived from the assets they're docked at.

docs.title: Tester & Debug System - Complete Guide
docs.description: Professional testing infrastructure for the Stringborn Universe, providing comprehensive debugging tools, real-time chat, bug reporting, and multiplayer monitoring for all testers.

docs.title: Documentation Cleanup Summary
docs.description: The zMDREADME directory has been completely reorganized to improve contextual access and eliminate redundancy.
